DESCRIPTION: Knives are the Servant's most dedicated weapons. Can be thrown or converted.
Temporal cards cost 0 and have #yEthereal and #yExhaust.
Blighted enemies will take extra damage when attacked.
Shift effects can only be triggered by manually discarding the card.
Predict the enemy intent for the next turn. If correct, trigger the effect(s) at the start of your next turn.
Whenever you lose HP, lose #yProtection instead. Protection will not be removed at the start of your next turn.
Elegance improves Block and Protection gained from cards.
Reduce Attack damage taken by #b50%. Lose #b1 Martix whenever you are attacked.
Whenever you use an Attack, lose #b1 Satellite and attack an extra time for #b4 damage. Whenever you are attacked, lose #b1 Satellite and deal #b4 damage to the attacker. Satellites count as Knives.
